# R session details


```{r Versions}
info <- sessionInfo()
r_ver <- paste(info$R.version$major, info$R.version$minor, sep = ".")
```
 
Analysis was performed using R (ver. `r r_ver`) and the following additional packages:

```{r packages_used}
lambda <- function(xx){c(Package = xx$Package, Version = xx$Version, Author = xx$Author)}

if (!is.null(info$otherPkgs)) {
  tmp <- lapply(X = info$otherPkgs, FUN = lambda)
  tmp <- do.call("rbind", tmp)
  tmp <- tmp[order(tmp[, 1]), ]
  pander::pander(tmp, caption = ("Packages used"))
}
```

```{r session}
sessionInfo()
```
